title: Welcome to Visual Analytics
description:
Welcome to my new blog, Visual Analytics. I hope you enjoy 
reading!

title: DataViz Makeover 1
contents:
1. Introduction
We are living in a world that is constantly producing a vast amount of data, and data visualization helps us to understand the data better. However, a poor visualization can be of little value, or even misleading. Visual analytics is not just about creating a pretty chart, but it is the marriage of data analytics and visualizations that aims to detect the expected and discover the unexpected.
This post will makeover Chart 6: Resident Labour Force by age group from page 22 of Labour Force in Singapore 2019 Report.
2. Original Visualization
Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.
